}} 'Fun-Da-Mental' is a British-based multi-ethnic hip-hopâethno-technoâworld
fusion music group formed in 1991. The group is notable for its energetic fusion
of Eastern and Western musical forms, for its outspoken political stance, and
for its strong Islamic affiliation and advocacy. Fun-Da-Mental's political
stance has led to the group earning the label "the Asian Public Enemy". The
group's work has led to international attention and collaborations with artists
from Pakistan, South Africa and Siberia.
